articles.content:
DPRK Boxer Wins Silver Medal in 28th Olympic Games 
    Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Song Guk of the DPRK came second in the men's featherweight of boxing in the 28th Olympic Games in Athens.
 He beat his Georgian opponent in 25-14 decision in the preliminaries, Nigerian in 32-11 decision in the quarterfinals and German in the semifinals to advance to the finals, which was held on August 28.

Ulji Focus Lens-04 Denounced Abroad
articles.content:
Ulji Focus Lens-04 Denounced Abroad 
    Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The Asian Regional Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, the Indian Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and the All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association issued a joint statement on Aug. 21 denouncing the "Ulji Focus Lens-04" joint military exercise.
 Recalling that the U.S. has persistently opposed the just proposals of the DPRK government for the final solution of the nuclear issue, the statement noted: The bellicose nature of the U.S. has been revealed by the joint military exercise to be staged by it from Aug. 23 to Sept. 3 under the pretext of coping with the "emergency on the Korean peninsula." This indicates that the "operation plan 5027-04", a U.S. scenario for a war of aggression against the DPRK, has reached the phase of its full-scale implementation and a nuclear war may break out on the Korean peninsula any time.    
 The statement bitterly denounced the reckless moves of the U.S. and the south Korean warhawks for a war of invasion as criminal moves to seriously harass the peace and security on the Korean peninsula and the region and urged them to immediately cancel the military exercise.

Director of Italian Institute of International Relations Arrives
articles.content:
Director of Italian Institute of International Relations Arrives
    Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Giancarlo Elia Valori, director of the Italian Institute of International Relations, arrived here Saturday.
 He was greeted at the airport by Pak Kyong Son, vice-director of a department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: GFTUK Delegation Leaves for China
articles.content:
GFTUK Delegation Leaves for China
    Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea led by Ryom Sun Gil, chairman of its Central Committee, left here today to visit China.
 It was seen off at the airport by Kim Yong Do, vice-chairman of the GFTUK Central Committee, and Guan Huabing, Chinese charge d'affaires a.i. in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Here
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Here
    Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference led by Vice-Chairman Li Zhaozhuo arrived here today.
 It was met at the airport by Kang Ryon Hak, presidium member of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of the Fatherland, officials concerned, Guan Huabing, Chinese charge d'affaires in Pyongyang and embassy officials.    
 In the evening the Central Committee of the DFRF gave a reception in honour of the delegation.
